tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_programs; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_programs AS SELECT th.amp_theme_id, th.parent_theme_id, th.theme_code, th.name, getprogramsettingid(th.amp_theme_id) AS program_setting_id, aps.name AS program_setting_name, b2.amp_theme_id as id2, b2.name AS name2, b2.level_ AS l2, b3.amp_theme_id as id3, b3.name AS name3, b3.level_ AS l3, b4.amp_theme_id as id4, b4.name AS name4, b4.level_ AS l4, b5.amp_theme_id as id5, b5.name AS name5, b5.level_ AS l5, b6.amp_theme_id as id6, b6.name AS name6, b6.level_ AS l6, b7.amp_theme_id as id7, b7.name AS name7, b7.level_ AS l7, b8.amp_theme_id as id8, b8.name AS name8, b8.level_ AS l8 FROM amp_theme th LEFT JOIN amp_theme b2 ON b2.amp_theme_id = th.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b3 ON b3.amp_theme_id = b2.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b4 ON b4.amp_theme_id = b3.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b5 ON b5.amp_theme_id = b4.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b6 ON b6.amp_theme_id = b5.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b7 ON b7.amp_theme_id = b6.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme b8 ON b8.amp_theme_id = b7.parent_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_program_settings aps ON aps.amp_program_settings_id = getprogramsettingid(th.amp_theme_id) ORDER BY th.amp_theme_id;
